commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration analyze
commands.summary: Analyze an NGINX configuration without applying it to the NGINXaaS deployment.
examples: az nginx deployment configuration analyze --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup --configuration-name default --root-file <nginx.conf> --package '{data:}'

commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration create
commands.summary: Create a configuration for an NGINX deployment.
commands.syntax:
az nginx deployment configuration create --configuration-name
                                         --deployment-name
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--files]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--package]
                                         [--protected-files]
                                         [--root-file]
examples: az nginx deployment configuration create --name default --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup --root-file /etc/nginx/nginx.conf --files "[{content:'',virtual-path:'/etc/nginx/nginx.conf'}]"

az nginx deployment configuration create --name default --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup --root-file /etc/nginx/nginx.conf --files "[{'content':'','virtual-path':'/etc/nginx/nginx.conf'},{'content':'','virtual-path':'/etc/nginx/conf.d/proxy.conf'}]"

az nginx deployment configuration create --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup --root-file nginx.conf --name default --package data=''

az nginx deployment configuration create --name default --deployment-name 0102242023test --resource-group azclitest-geo --root-file /etc/nginx/nginx.conf --files "[{'content':'','virtual-path':'/etc/nginx/nginx.conf'},{'content':'','virtual-path':'/etc/nginx/conf.d/proxy.conf'}]" --protected-files "[{'content':'','virtual-path':'/etc/nginx/nginxprot.conf'},{'content':'','virtual-path':'/etc/nginx/conf.d/proxyprot.conf'}]"

commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration delete
commands.syntax:
az nginx deployment configuration delete [--configuration-name]
                                         [--deployment-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--yes]
examples: az nginx deployment configuration delete --name default --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup

commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration list
commands.summary: List all configurations under the specified deployment and resource group.
examples: az nginx deployment configuration list --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup

commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration show
commands.summary: Get the properties of a specific NGINX configuration.
examples: az nginx deployment configuration show --name default --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup

commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration update
commands.syntax:
az nginx deployment configuration update [--add]
                                         [--configuration-name]
                                         [--deployment-name]
                                         [--files]
                                         [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--package]
                                         [--protected-files]
                                         [--remove]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--root-file]
                                         [--set]
                                         [--subscription]
examples: az nginx deployment configuration update --name default --deployment-name myDeployment --resource-group myResourceGroup --files [0].content=""

commands.name: az nginx deployment configuration wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
